rulesPage.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the baby arrival bet!
rulesPage.pricePerDate: $2 per date — Bet on as many days as you want!
rulesPage.paymentMethods: Payment via Venmo or Cash — Bets aren't final until paid
rulesPage.step1Description: Pick any date between {start} and {end}. Want better odds? Bet on multiple dates!
rulesPage.step2Description: Enter your name and select your date. You'll receive a unique verification code (e.g., "JS-7K3M") that you'll use to track your bet.
rulesPage.step3VenmoDescription: Venmo: After submitting, you'll be redirected to Venmo. The payment note will include your name, date, and verification code. Complete the ${amount} payment instantly.
rulesPage.step3CashDescription: Cash: After submitting, save your verification code. Pay ${amount} in cash in person and provide your code to confirm your bet.
rulesPage.step4Description: Once payment is confirmed, your bet is locked in. The person who guesses closest to the actual arrival date wins!
rulesPage.multipleEntriesDescription: Bet on multiple days? Each date is a separate ${amount} entry. Just submit the form once for each date you want to bet on!
rulesPage.notFinalWarning: Your bet is NOT final until payment is received and confirmed. Make sure to complete payment right after submitting your guess!
rulesPage.venmoPaymentDescription: After you submit your guess, you'll be redirected to Venmo with all the payment details pre-filled. Just tap "Pay" to complete the transaction.
rulesPage.cantFindVenmo: Can't find Venmo? Make sure the app is installed on your phone. If you don't have Venmo, you'll be redirected to the website instead.
rulesPage.cashPaymentDescription: After you submit your guess, save your verification code. Bring ${amount} cash and your code to pay in person. Your bet will be marked as paid once received.
rulesPage.winningDescription: The winner is whoever guesses closest to the actual arrival date. If multiple people guess the same winning date, the prize will be split.
rulesPage.winnerAnnouncement: The winner will be announced after baby arrives!
rulesPage.faqQ1: Can I bet on the same date twice?
rulesPage.faqA1: Yes! Each bet is separate, so you can increase your chances on a specific date.
rulesPage.faqQ2: Can I change my guess after paying?
rulesPage.faqA2: No, all bets are final once payment is confirmed. Choose wisely!
rulesPage.faqQ3: What if I forget to pay?
rulesPage.faqA3: Your guess won't be counted until payment is received. You can submit a new guess and complete the payment at any time before the deadline.
rulesPage.faqQ4: How do I know if my payment went through?
rulesPage.faqA4: Check your Venmo transaction history. Your verification code will be in the payment note.
